original_title: Sri Lanka’s shares down in mid day trade
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s shares edged down in mid day trade, Colombo Stock Exchange data showed.
The main All Share Price Index was down 0.52 percent or 49.33 points to 9,384.93, the most liquid index S&P SL20 was down 0.52 percent or 14.22 points to 2,700.64.
Losers during mid day trade were Sampath Bank, Melstacorp and Hayleys. (Colombo/June27/2023)
